009package Ch16_ColorEdges;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.edges.EdgeDetector;
017import imagingbook.common.edges.GrayscaleEdgeDetector;
018import imagingbook.common.edges.GrayscaleEdgeDetector.Parameters;
019import imagingbook.core.FileUtils;
020
021/**
022 * TThis is a simple grayscale edge detector for RGB color images.
023 * @author WB
024 * @version 2014/02/17
025 */
026public class Color_Edges_Gray implements PlugInFilter {
027        
028        static boolean showEdgeMagnitude = true;
029        static boolean showEdgeOrientation = false;
030        
031        ImagePlus imp = null;
032
033    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
034        this.imp = imp;
035        return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
036    }
037
038    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
039        String title = imp.getTitle();
040        title = FileUtils.stripFileExtension(title);
041        GrayscaleEdgeDetector.Parameters params = new Parameters();
042        
043        if (!setParameters(params)) 
044                return;
045        
046        EdgeDetector ced = new GrayscaleEdgeDetector(ip, params);
047                
048        if (showEdgeMagnitude) {
049                FloatProcessor edgeMagnitude = ced.getEdgeMagnitude();
050                (new ImagePlus("Edge Magnitude (Gray)", edgeMagnitude)).show();
051        }
052                
053                if (showEdgeOrientation) {
054                        FloatProcessor edgeOrientation = ced.getEdgeOrientation();
055                        (new ImagePlus("Edge Orientation (Gray)", edgeOrientation)).show();
056                }
057    }
058    
059    boolean setParameters(Parameters params) {
060                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
061                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge magnitude", showEdgeMagnitude);
062                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge orientation", showEdgeOrientation);
063                
064                gd.showDialog();
065                if(gd.wasCanceled()) 
066                        return false;
067                
068                showEdgeMagnitude = gd.getNextBoolean();
069                showEdgeOrientation = gd.getNextBoolean();
070                return true;
071    }
072      
073}
074
